body.p: News on Gentoo Linux 1.4 is included in this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. Additional news includes a new partnership with NeTraverse, FOSDEM updates and a raft of Gentoo Linux Security Announcements.

Additionally, the GWN is seeking active participants on the gentoo-dev mailing list who are willing to summarize the hot topics and discussions on gentoo-dev each week. Folks interested in helping out should send an email to gwn-feedback@gentoo.org.
